46445 49657 People once believed
that when someone dies...

49782 54036 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

54119 57498 But sometimes,
something so bad happens...

57581 62836 that a terrible sadness is carried
with it and the soul can't rest.

62962 65965 Then, sometimes--
just sometimes--

66090 71053 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.

125649 130154 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
Wedding was tomorrow night.

130279 134450 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?

137953 141582 - Sir, we gotta move her.

141665 144710 - All right, guys, let's do it.

cleared this with me first.

to me about Shelly.
235301 237303 She's gonna die, isn't she?

Come on, it's okay.
254153 256238 She's gonna be fine.

All that is left is ashes.

that was true about everything--

290147 294401 two people who are meant to be

like the night watchman?

this place needs...

like in the Bible.

Okay, the rings.

2613262 2617099 - Hey, hey, hon!

2621478 2624648 You stay put right there.
2634116 2636201 Get away, steamhead.

2802368 2808165 Yeah, well, you got

2812211 2816048 Uh, give me something

2830479 2833649 I kept asking questions and...

2833774 2836402 finally got busted for sticking my nose

2840406 2842366 This your wife?

2855504 2857840 I used to think
